Research Teaching Service CV Gallery

Alexander Wilson

My Dartmouth directed reading program student Sofia Goncalves presenting her poster.
This site was last updated on April 4, 2024. It was created using Jekyll with interactive components running on p5.js.

Service

  • Co-facilitator of the racial justice seminar in the Dartmouth math department. I've summarized our materials and structure here, but feel free to reach out with any questions!

Outreach

  • Spring 2022: Co-organizer of Dartmouth's Sonia Kovalevsky Day
  • Summer 2020: Camp leader in Dartmouth's Exploring Mathematics
  • Spring 2019: Graduate leader in Dartmouth's Sonia Kovalevsky Day leading a workshop about Eulerian paths

Mentoring

Dartmouth Directed Reading Program (website)

  • Winter 2023: Mentored Sofia Goncalves reading from Magical Mathematics - Diaconis and Graham
  • Spring 2022: Mentored Calvin George reading from Computing the Continuous Discretely - Beck and Robins
  • Winter 2021: Mentored Eliza Crocker reading from Representations and Characters of Groups - James and Liebeck
